name: Perform evaluation on a preconfigured inference unit without essential evaluation criteria

steps.name: Given a valid, preconfigured inference unit for image binary classification
And an evaluation plan file for image binary classification with no evaluation tasks and no report specification
When we run inference unit evaluation
Then a successful result indicating all criteria passed is computed
Then the precision metric is calculated to be 0.62
Then the recall metric is calculated to be 0.28
Then the f1 metric is calculated to be 0.38
Then the rocauc metric is calculated to be 0.59
Then the acc metric is calculated to be 0.68

fullName: It must be possible to assess that an image binary classification inference unit behaves as intended: Perform evaluation on a preconfigured inference unit without essential evaluation criteria

labels.name: feature
labels.value: It must be possible to assess that an image binary classification inference unit behaves as intended
